duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct high-resolution Quality Control of long-form content to ensure compliance with technical specifications.
Perform baseband/linear ingest of content for on-air, VOD, and online distribution.
Execute edit and prep functions within an editing platform to prepare long-form content for distribution.
Utilize Media Asset Management (MAM) systems to prioritize and process long-form content.
Submit content into transcoding technical stack to meet client specifications.
Reconcile executed work orders to ensure business needs are met.
Work on any shift, including overnights, swing, or weekends, sometimes on short notice, to support the 24/7 operation.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Film, Media, Communications, or related field
